i18n.key: Columns in the multi-line text field.
Rows in the multi-line text field.
Maximum number of characters the user will be able to type in to the field.
Minimum number of characters the user will be able to type in to the field.
Determines if this text field must contain the recipient's email address.
Allows disabling the automatic change to capital of the first letter entered in the field.
pre-fill with the first name if logged in
Check "yes" for the field to be pre-filled in with the first name if the user is logged in.
pre-fill with the last name if logged in
Check "yes" for the field to be pre-filled in with the last name if the user is logged in.
